Description: The Best Real Time Voice Changer for Online Games and Video Streaming. Troll like a PRO!
Name: Voicemod

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.addvoice.Name: Voice Changer
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.addvoice.Tooltip: This action lets you choose a Voice Changer effect to add and use

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Name: Voice Changer On/Off
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Tooltip: This action switches the Voice Changer on/off

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Name: Voice Changer On
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Tooltip: This action switches voice changer On

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Name: Voice Changer Off
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.voicechanger.Tooltip: This action switches voice changer Off

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.pushtotalk.Name: Activate Voice Changer
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.pushtotalk.Tooltip: This action activates the Voice Changer as long as you hold down the keypad button

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoiceo.Name: Hear my voice On
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoiceo.Tooltip: This action switches hear my voice On

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoiceo.Name: Hear my voice Off
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.hearmyvoiceo.Tooltip: This action switches hear my voice Off

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.backgroundsw.Name: Background Effects On/Off
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.backgroundsw.Tooltip: This action switches the background effects on/off

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.randomvoice.Name: Random Voice
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.randomvoice.Tooltip: This action selects a random voice

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.badlanguage.Name: Instant Censor Beep
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.badlanguage.Tooltip: This action mutes the mic and plays a censoring beep

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.pushtomemeso.Name: Soundboard
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.pushtomemeso.Tooltip: This action plays a Soundboard audio file

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.stopallsound.Name: Stop All Soundboard Sounds
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.stopallsound.Tooltip: This action stops all active Soundboard sounds

net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.muteforme.Name: Mute for me On/Off
net.voicemod.windowsdesktop.muteforme.Tooltip: This action mutes/unmutes the sound for me
